description: Themistocles was instrumental in convincing the Athenians to fortify the port town of Piraeus and its 3 strategically placed harbors. This crucial act would help set up Athens as the foremost naval power in the Eastern Mediterranean Sea over the subsequent decades.
requirementsTooltip: Unlocked in City Phase after choosing the hero Themistocles.
tooltip: Stone Walls and Shipyards +25% health, but also +20% cost and build time.
